# Documentation
We have provided a README describing the structure of this workflowr, as well as READMEs within subfolders as needed. 

A list of R-related dependencies for reproducing the figures in the LUCAS manuscript is available in the [SessionInfo](../docs/SessionInfo.html) document. Most of the R packages are available from Bioconductor or CRAN.
